name: RubikTimer3x3
0:
”Alexa, open Rubik Timer”
”Alexa, start Rubik Timer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rubik timer
des:
Rubik Timer skill is a simple Rubik's cube timer and scrambler with the scrambled image (required a screen).

Open the skill to get a new random scramble with the scrambled image, Cube Timer will be automatically started after the scrambled time (approximately 30 seconds). Tap the screen when you solved the Rubik's cube, tap the screen again or say "Alexa, Next" to get a new scramble. You can have Alexa stop at any time by saying "Alexa, stop," or any of its equivalents.

Happy cubing!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
